Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Created by Hein Ferman
23.09.2014 SH SCR19169 Task "Produce batches": Added test CHQU_BATCHESCREATED = 'N'
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.11.2011 GB SCR16963 Added the 3.8 Received from bank
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
26.04.2011 GB SCR16397 Repleced the GNRL_SCANNINGOFPAYMENTDOCS by
the GSBU_YESNO (2005)
01.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
21.01.2010 SH SCR15268 Changed test to enable modification on CHQU_CURRENCY,
now only allowed if not already cheques exists in CHQE
13.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Added verification for Administration number
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
01.08.2008 SH SCR13846 OPH103MB Added test on HYPB_SCANNED = P
16.05.2006 SH SCR11276 Fixed bug with deletion of CHQE rows
04.04.2006 CO SCR10712 Currency not modifiable (like amount)
07.03.2006 SH SCR10541 Fixed problems with multiple selection fo selection
criterias, see SCR for more details
13.12.2005 AK SCR 9742 It is not allowed to modify CHQU_TOTAUNIT if
CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES = Y and modify mode
22.11.2005 SH SCR 9509 Added filter v.Office
10.11.2005 SH SCR9352 Added new screen where users could select if a letter has
to be created for the current selected CHQU row or for all CHQU rows, incl. the
related functions
04.05.2005 JJ SCR8038 - Separate authorization for button "make batches"
- Button "Foreign cheques" always enabled
17.01.2005 BT SCR7422 correction additional selection
11.01.2005 BT SCR7422 add additional selection
28.12.2004 BT SCR7422 add checkbox on screen.
//24.09.2004 EE SCR#7051 extended storage of new cheque unit
08.08.2003 SH Delete unused expression
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
14.07.2003 EE SCR3960 change locking strategy for foreign cheques
19.05.2003 SH SCR3576 Added new column "Scan number" and executed the
- "Scan prepare" function for all selected rows (multimarking)
22.04.2003 SH SCR3369 Init CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES with 'N'
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
20.03.2003 SCR3170 SH Remoced transactions and locking strategy in task
- "Produce batches" because we got a lot of lockings
16.12.2002 SCR2635 SH Delete HYPB rows after pressing button OK and
- CHQU_NUMBERANNEXESTOSCAN was set to 0
10.12.2002 SCR1931 SH Changed logic of function "Make batches", see SPECS
22.10.2002 SCR1931 Swichted SELECTS of CHQU-row from MAGIC in DSQL-Statement
- to enabled the radiobutton on the button of the screen and display empty table
Change the test for option 1 from CHQU_BATCHESCREATED = false to
CHQU_BPH240STARTED = false
At the end where BPH240 is started (submit server job) set CHQU_BPH240STARTED
-- 05.06.2002 SH Do "Make batches" only if CHQU_TOTNCHEQUES >0
-- SCR#412 --> OK 11.12.2001 (scanning part)
-- SCR#836 20.02.2002 SH (New logic 'Scan prepare', diff. changes)

cheque unit ill be modified

virtuals to store data for new/modified cheque units
virtuals for calling program OPH103A

// Delete Cheque unit
// Reserve CHQU_ID for current user
// Release CHQU_ID for other users

-- First reserve all cheque units which have to be handled by BPH240

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CHQU_UNITDATE, CHQU_ID, CHQU_BANK_ADMNO, CHQU_BANK_LEDG_NO, CHQU_TOTNCHEQUES, CHQU_TOTAUNIT, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQU_TOTABOOKED, CHQU_USERID, CHQU_TOTARECEIVED, CHQU_NUMBERANNEXESTOSCAN, CHQU_ENTRYFINISHED, CHQU_BATCHESCREATED, CHQU_RECEIVEDFROMBANK, CHQU_RUNNUMBER, CHQU_HYPB_BATCHNO, CHQU_BPH240STARTED,CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES, CHQU_RECEIVEDFROMBANK FROM :1 :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- see remark in R.S.
// Radio button
-- If filter CHQU_OFFICE was changed "Control event" has to be skipped,
otherwise "Control event" is performed twice and OPH103 is closed immed
-- close OPH103
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly from the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
... only if no other selection criteria was selected directly before
-- Prepare scannings for all selected CHQU rows
-- Refresh screen
... only if no other selection criteria was selected directly before
... only if no other selection criteria was selected directly before

ExpSyntax.val: {0,14}='N' AND (Trim ({0,10})='' OR Trim ({0,10})=User (0)) AND InStr ({1,2},'M')<>0 AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE))
({0,10}='' OR Trim ({0,10})=User (0)) AND InStr ({1,2},'M')<>0 AND InStr ({1,3},'M')<>0 AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE))
({0,10}='' OR Trim ({0,10})=User (0)) AND InStr ({1,2},'M')<>0 AND InStr ({1,3},'M')<>0 AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE))

Text.val: -- see remark in the task below --> 'Check for locked cheque unit'
Button OK --> GOTO OPH103A to make cheques
-- Cheque unit locked
-- Cheque unit isn't locked
-- Cancel
-- New cheque or modify cheque
-- only when cheque unit will be modified
-- Cheque unit locked
-- Cheque unit isn't locked
-- New cheque unit
-- End Block New/Modify cheque units
-- Delete Cheque unit, GOTO Foreign Cheques --> OPH103B, or
-- create Letters for bank
-- Cheque unit locked
-- Cheque unit isn't locked
-- Foreign cheques
Button Scanning prepare
Button Make batches
-- Cheque unit locked
-- Or user doesn't have OPH103MB modify right
-- Cheque unit isn't locked AND user has OPH103MB modify right
-- Refresh
-- ATTENTION: Leave this BLOCK at the END of the R.S., because in the
-- above BLOCKS, the virtual p.Action would be modified to 'R'!
-- see also remark in the below task 'Check for locked cheque unit'
-- This task is relevant for multiuser environment
-- If one User located on a Cheque row and an other User located on
-- the same row and pressed a Button to modifiy the cheque unit or to
-- work with cheques the actual view for the User who still located on
-- the row, is not updated. He could also press a Button and could
-- modfify the same cheque unit or related cheques.
-- THIS IS NOT ALLOWED!!!
-- So we first have to look, if the cheque unit row is 'locked' by an
-- other User (--> CHQU_USERID <> '' or <> USER()).
-- If it's locked, the actual screen will be refreshed.
-- Attention: Reals from the Link Query are modifiable!!!
-- see remark in R.S.
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- errors
-- Reset v.WhatToDoTask with '', otherwise it's not possible to leave
-- the task by starting an other program directly from the menu
-- nor errors
-- Save changes
-- OK, Save
-- Cancel

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{6,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,13}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,23}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,27}'VAR)

-- Call BPH240

still working on the cheque unit
